resources.string: Mwayi Wopezeka pa System womwe amagwiritsidwa ntchito muutumikiwu ndi:
"- Kuthekera Kuphatikizika : kuyika batani losawoneka mozungulira ndi pansi pa chodula cha kamera yakutsogolo kuti igwire ntchito ngati njira yachidule ya ntchito zosankhidwa ndi ogwiritsa ntchito"
Sinthani kuwala kwa skrini pakati pa zinthu zotsika ndi zapamwamba
Pangani dzenje la kamera kuti lizilumikizana, pomwe palibe zidziwitso kapena zochitika zomwe zikuyenera kuwonetsedwa, kuwonekera pamadulidwe a kamera:
Sinthani mawu oyimbira (mawu / osalankhula). tsegulani foni mosavuta musanagone ndikuyiyikanso kuti ikhale yomveka mukadzuka
Choyamba, yambitsani chilolezo cha ntchito yofikira anthu
Choyamba yambitsani Dynamic Notification mukamaliza zoikamo
Lolani pulogalamu kuti igwire ntchito chakumbuyo
Chonde onani tsamba ili %1$s ndikuwona masitepe okhala ndi zithunzi
Chidziwitso chofunikira ndi chomwe chimabwerezedwa nthawi zambiri ngati zidziwitso za pop-up
Imayamba pa sikirini yonse pomwe sikirini Yozimitsidwa
Pangani kudula kwa kamera ngati mawonekedwe abilu
Blutani zidziwitso pomwe chipangizocho chili chokhoma.
Onetsani zidziwitso kuzungulira dzenje la kamera kapena malo osiyanasiyana pazenera ndi masitayelo amakono ambiri oti musankhe. imathanso kukhazikitsidwa ngati chidziwitso cha kuwala kwa LED.
Gwiritsani ntchito dzenje la kamera ngati chizindikiro cha mulingo wa batri ngati mzere wozungulira kuzungulira dzenje la kamera zikuwonetsanso kupita patsogolo kwa kulipiritsa.
Onetsani zotsitsa ndi zokwezedwa pano ngati mzere wozungulira kuzungulira dzenje la kamera.
Sinthani dzenje la kamera kukhala batani lachidule! khazikitsani zochita zodziyimira pawokha pakukhudza kulikonse, dinani kawiri, dinani kwanthawi yayitali ndikusintha mbali zonse za kamera.
Chiwonetsero cha makanema ojambula chikuyimira kuyitanitsa ndi kuchuluka kwa batri
Kusuntha zidziwitso zokulitsidwa kuti muchotse, kudzachotsanso chidziwitso chenicheni
Dinani adzatsegula ndipo kudina kwautali kudzakulitsa
Chidziwitso Champhamvu chikawonekera, bisani kapamwamba pophimba ndi mtundu woyenera komanso ngati palibe chochitika cha Dynamic Notification wonetsani bar
Chidziwitso chofikira pa data ya ogwiritsa

"Mwayi wamba. popanda kusunga kapena kugawana deta yanu. zonse zomwe zimachitika kwanuko mumakhodi pafoni yanu. - Funsani ma phukusi onse omwe adayikidwa kuti mutha kusintha mtundu wa Dynamic Notification pa pulogalamu iliyonse. "
Choyamba zimitsani Dynamic Notification kenako yambitsani Helper kenako yambitsani Dynamic Notification
Chidziwitso chalandira zidziwitso mu mawonekedwe okulitsidwa, amachepetsedwa pakadutsa masekondi angapo ndipo amatha kuchepetsedwa, kutsegulidwa kapena kuyeretsedwa polumikizana nawo.
Chiwonetsero chalandira zidziwitso mu mawonekedwe ochepera, omwe amatha kukulitsidwa, kutsegulidwa kapena kuyeretsedwa mwakuchita nawo.
"Kuwonetsa kulandila zidziwitso mu mawonekedwe okulitsidwa ngati ndichidziwitso chofunikira, komanso m'mawonekedwe ochepetsedwa kuti azidziwitso zanthawi zonse"
Kamodzi mutalandira zidziwitso, kenako wonetsaninso nthawi iliyonse chophimba chikatsegulidwa kapena kutsekedwa.
Lolani kuti pulogalamuyi izigwira ntchito mukafuna.
Lolani makina kuti aletse pulogalamuyi kuti isagwire ntchito nthawi zina.
Ndikofunikira kuwathandiza mwadongosolo; choyamba yambitsani Dynamic Notification Helper ndiye yambitsani Dynamic Notification
Mtengo umatengera masekondi kukhala njira yanga kosatha ndikundilimbikitsa kupanga masitayelo ambiri ndi mawonekedwe
"Bluring zenera mukamakulitsa pamanja chidziwitso kuti muyang'ane pazidziwitso zowonjezera"
"Dimitsani skrini mukakulitsa chidziwitso pamanja kuti muyang'ane pazidziwitso zokulitsidwa"
Onerani zambiri kuposa kutsatsa kuti mukhudze zambiri

"Mtundu wazithunzi zonse, zosavuta kuwerenga ngati foni ilibe m'manja, yosavuta kuchita ndikuseweranso zidziwitso. ikhoza kukhazikitsidwa kuti iwonetse zidziwitso pomwe chophimba cha chipangizocho chazimitsidwa komanso kukulitsa pamanja chilumba chazidziwitso kuti chikhale pazithunzi zonse pomwe chophimba cha chipangizocho chiyatsidwa."
Kuti muyankhe zidziwitso popanda kuwerenga zomwe zili
Zokonda zowoneratu zosintha mayeso a Dynamic Notification
Kungoyimba foni (kuyimba / osayimba), osadziwa zambiri zakuyimbira, kupewa kukhudza kovomerezeka mukamayimba foni.
"-Window State Changed : Bowo la kamera lolumikizana"
"- Kuthekera Kwambiri : kotero mukalandira zidziwitso, chophimba chikayatsidwa, ntchitoyi ijambula kapamwamba kakang'ono kowonera ngati ticker pafupi ndi chodula cha kamera, ili ndi zidziwitso. "
Ikani kalembedwe (chithunzi chokha) pakulipira, nyimbo ndi zochitika zoyimbira
Mphete yopitilira ikuwonetsa kuti batri ili ndi charger
Kuunikira kobiriwira kukunyezimira mozungulira dzenje la kamera
Kuwala kofiyira kukuwalira mozungulira dzenje la kamera
Mphete yopitilira ikuwonetsa mulingo wa batri womwe ulipo
Onetsani chizindikiritso cha batri pa onlu mukakhala pa skrini yoyambitsa
Kodi simukutopa ndi mapangidwe azidziwitso achikhalidwe pa android?!
Ziritsani zokha mukawonetsa pomwe sikirini yozimitsa
Onetsani Chidziwitso Champhamvu chowonetsa nyimbo zikusewera
Palibe deta ya ogwiritsa ntchito yomwe yasonkhanitsidwa kapena kugawidwa monga momwe zalengezedwa mu sitolo ya Google Play -> tsamba la pulogalamuyi -> Chitetezo cha Data.
Osagwira ntchito pomwe skrini ili mu mawonekedwe owoneka bwino

Pulogalamuyi ilibe chilolezo cholowera pa intaneti, kotero kuti data yanu sikupita kulikonse, mutha kutsimikizira izi kuchokera pazidziwitso za pulogalamu -> zilolezo, pa google play kapena kudina kwakanthawi chizindikiro cha pulogalamu.
Chipangizochi sichikhala ndi dzenje la kamera. Komabe, mutha kugwiritsabe ntchito zolumikizirana pokhudza chapakati chazenera ngati kuti pali dzenje la kamera.
Ngati kudulidwa kwa kamera sikuli dzenje
Ngati kudziwitsidwa kwa dzenje la kamera sikuli kolondola, mutha kuyisintha mu gawo la (kukula ndi kuyika).
Chiwonetsero chazidziwitso za utoto kuzungulira kudula kwa kamera
Zikhazikiko Zadongosolo -> Kufikika -> ntchito zothandizidwa / zoyika -> Dynamic Notification Helper
Gwiritsani ntchito kudula kwa kamera kuti muwone zidziwitso zomwe mwalandira mwanjira yapadera komanso yaukadaulo
Zikhazikiko Zadongosolo -> Kufikika -> ntchito zothandizidwa / zoyika -> Chidziwitso Champhamvu
Zikhazikiko Zadongosolo -> Kufikika -> ntchito zoyatsidwa / zoyika -> Chidziwitso Champhamvu
Pezani NotiGuy moyo wanu umafunika theka la mtengo.
Olekanitsidwa, pafupi ndi dzenje la kamera
"M'lifupi mwake ndi kutalika konse kwa kapamwamba"
Pokonzekera kugwiritsa ntchito koyamba, chonde yesaninso pakadutsa masekondi angapo.
Onetsani pomwe chophimba chazimitsidwa kapena mkati mwa AOD
Kuti tikukumbutseni zidziwitso zomwe zapachikidwa, pomwe sikirini ili Yoyatsidwa, bwerezani kuwonetsa chilumba pamasekondi %1$s aliwonse.

ZOFUNIKA KWAMBIRI: ngati muli ndi pulogalamu ina yofananira, ikuyesera kupondereza zidziwitso zowonekera ndikulephera ... zikhudza pulogalamuyi ndikupangitsa kuti isalephereke, kotero chonde musanayese, zimitsani izi mu mapulogalamu ena, ngati zilipo. kapena kuletsa Notification Listener

"Zindikirani: pa samsung pulogalamuyo imatha kubisa zidziwitso zowonekera koma sizingabisike kapamwamba kakang'ono ka samsung kotero chonde khazikitsani zidziwitso ku Detailed in system -> zidziwitso"
Onetsani Chidziwitso Champhamvu chokha popanda kuwonetsa kuwonekera koyambirira kwachidziwitso.
Onetsani chithunzi chachidule cha makanema ojambula chikuyimira njira yatsopano yoyimbira
Onetsani Chidziwitso Champhamvu mukakhala ndi zidziwitso (zochitika) ndipo skrini ili
- kuti mugwire ntchito pomwe chinsalu chazimitsidwa, Chipangizocho chiyenera kukhala ndi njira yokhoma, osachepera ( swipe kuti mutsegule) kapena Kuwonetsedwa Nthawi Zonse Kwayatsidwa
- ngati chidziwitso chikalandiridwa pomwe chinsalu chikuyaka, ndipo pulogalamuyo idawonetsa, sichidzawonetsanso pomwe chophimba chikazimitsidwa chifukwa mukudziwa kale kuti muli nacho.

Chidziwitso chidzazindikiridwa ngati chikuwoneka pokhapokha mutachikulitsa pamanja, kuchepetsa kapena kusuntha chidziwitso chokulitsidwa, kusuntha zidziwitso zocheperako kapena kukana chidziwitso chenicheni.
Ngati %1$s Imayatsidwa Nthawi Zonse, wonetsani Zidziwitso zamphamvu mkati mwake
Zofanana ndi kukula kwa dzenje la kamera

"Kulembetsa kwanu kudzasinthidwa zokha ndipo mudzalipidwa ndalama zomwe zatchulidwa pamwambapa chaka chilichonse kapena mwezi uliwonse (zosankha ndi inu) mpaka mutaletsa kulembetsa kwanu kusanathe nthawi yolembetsa yomwe ilipo. mutha kuyang'anira zolembetsa ndikuzimitsa kukonzanso zokha kuchokera ku zokonda za akaunti ya Google Play. komanso kuchokera patsamba lofikira la pulogalamuyi -> ( Sinthani Kulembetsa) batani"
Yendetsani kumanzere kapena kumanja kumachotsa chiwonetsero chazidziwitso osati chidziwitso chenicheni. ndipo ngati pali zidziwitso zambiri chotsatira chidzawonetsedwa
Khazikitsani koyamba, ndikuwonetsetsa kuti zilolezo zofunika zayatsidwa, kenako dinani kuyesa kuti muyambe kuyesa mphindi 5.
Mutha kuyesa masitayilo apamwamba musanagule. gwiritsani ntchito batani lowoneratu (chizindikiro cha diso)
Sungani mpaka chidziwitso chiwerengedwa kapena kuchotsedwa

"- pulogalamu yodzipatulira yolumikizira dzenje la kamera. - zambiri zatsatanetsatane. - kuthekera kokhazikitsa magawo olekanitsidwa kuti mugwire kamodzi, dinani kawiri, kukhudza kwautali, sinthani kumanja ndikusinthira kumanzere. - zimatengera chilolezo chimodzi chokha."
Pocket Mode, Pewani kukhudza mukakhala pa loko yotchinga

Chifukwa premium? Izi zidatipangitsa kuti tigwire ntchito molimbika monga kusintha zidziwitso zamakina kuwonekera ndikupangitsa kutalika kwa zidziwitso kukhala kofanana ndi kutalika kwa dzenje la kamera kumangopezeka pa pulogalamuyi palibe pulogalamu yapa play store yomwe ingachite izi kuphatikiza mapulogalamu ofanana osasiya kupanga masitaelo ndi mitundu.
